label: Transform expression data
description: Parses and transforms users differential expression data

parameters.desc: Metadata template filled out by the user
parameters.label: Metadata File

parameters.desc: Path to which the output will be written. Defaults to the directory containing the input data.
parameters.label: Output Folder

parameters.desc: Basename for the generated output files. Defaults to the basename of the input data.
parameters.label: File Basename
